summary: This bill, the Alan Reinstein Ban Asbestos Now Act of 2025, aims to amend the Toxic Substances Control Act to prohibit the manufacture, processing, use, and distribution of commercial asbestos and asbestos-containing materials. It defines commercial asbestos, outlines exclusions (e.g., existing installations), and provides exemptions for the chlor-alkali industry and national security purposes. Further, the bill includes reporting and transparency requirements for exemption applications and grants.
